title: Nutritional Information Needs Analysis for the Elderly and Educational Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nutritional concepts and understanding of adult learning principles
context.additional_context: A short-term course for language professionals focused on analyzing nutritional information needs of the elderly and designing effective educational methods

learning_goals: Can analyze nutritional information needs of older adults within sociocultural and health contexts
Can design senior-tailored educational content applying adult learning principles
Can develop assessment strategies to foster large-scale learner engagement in online environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
